name: ink-love2d-vn-test
description: A first attempt at adding Ink to Love2d

scripts.build: mkdir -p release && npx love.js --compatibility --title "Ink and Love2d Visual Novel Test" src release
scripts.zip: rm -f ink-love2d-vn-test.zip; pushd release; zip -9 -r ../ink-love2d-vn-test.zip *; popd
scripts.love: rm -f ink-love2d-vn-test.love; pushd src; zip -9 -r ../ink-love2d-vn-test.love *; popd

author: JimOfLeisure
